Name: An fMRI dataset in response to "The Grand Budapest Hotel", a socially-rich, naturalistic movie
Acknowledgements: We thank Terry Sackett and the rest of the DBIC (Dartmouth Brain Imaging Center) personnel for assistance in data collection, and Yaroslav Halchenko for preparing the BIDS dataset.
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite the corresponding paper describing the dataset: Visconti di Oleggio Castello, M., Chauhan, V., Jiahui, G., & Gobbini, M. I. An fMRI dataset in response to “The Grand Budapest Hotel”, a socially-rich, naturalistic movie. Sci Data 7, 383 (2020). https://doi.org/10.1038/s41597-020-00735-4
